metadata.name: Shell Execution via Nice - Linux
metadata.comment: Detects the use of the "nice" utility to execute a shell. Such behavior may be associated with privilege escalation, unauthorized command execution, or to break out from restricted environments.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/nice')) AND (endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/bin/bash')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/bin/dash')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/bin/fish')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/bin/sh')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/bin/zsh'))))

output.summary: Detects the use of the "nice" utility to execute a shell. Such behavior may be associated with privilege escalation, unauthorized command execution, or to break out from restricted environments.
